entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 6.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
